answers.answer: 39 days to go! I'm having LOTS of regular frequent Braxton hicks that sent me to the triage twice to get checked out I was so worried... Also have pelvic pain.. I can't wait for him to be here!! Getting so anxious considering my friend just had her baby today.. But she is only 34 weeks

Oh my.. Ive been having pains to but to scared to go to the hospital just thinking its normal then I see posts of other mommies giving birth at early weeks makes me think twice but anxious to meet my baby too... Good luck mama

She was due two days before me but she had preeclampsia so they decided to induce. And as far as pain I guess just not to worry unless you are getting lots of painful contractions really close apart :) good luck to you too :)
37 days... I feel pretty good other than the back pain and fatigue... But am tired of feeling big and uncomfortable most of the time,  can't wait to meet my baby girl :-)
I'm fine. I have 63 more days. I am due on 9:30.  I am measuring at 30 but I'm 30.6.
35days togo icnt wait!!!!! Im doing good
What an excitment .. Down to 41 today days are going by pretty fast feeling somewhat pains but it will all be worth it.. Few more days mommies

59 days to go with my first baby. Little girl. (:so excited for her to just be here already. She likes to roll into my rib cage which hurts, but usually she's down in my hips so I've had quite a bit of pain. Had a scare about a month ago with bleeding and what felt to me like contractions, but everything checked out normal so we're hoping for September 18th.

question: 45 days to go.. Ready to have my prince in my arms.. This is baby #4.. Feeling pains right there and then but I'm doing great how about you all how many weeks and how are you all feeling?
title: how are you all doing?
